channel.title: Halo Sig - first sig in a while
channel.description:

and yes i did brush over the render...
rate it and comment [i]Tasa y comentario[/i]

item.title: Halo Sig - first sig in a while
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:18, topic:162226”]Well I haven’t done GFX in quite awhile but visually everything except the font is very pleasing. Only issue with the font is that at first, I couldn’t see it. Then when I spotted it it seemed plain and unappealing, which is probably why I missed spotting it at first.

ThAt0n36Uy, as exe said - it’s the final product that counts not the time/methods that went into making it. Just relax when someone doesn’t like your criticism. I’m sure if you disagreed with what someone said about your work you’d react similarly ;)[/quote]

I would rather have people look at the sig first instead of my name though.

Read full topic

@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:19, topic:162226”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=220642.msg2013659#msg2013659 date=1201274331]
Well I haven’t done GFX in quite awhile but visually everything except the font is very pleasing. Only issue with the font is that at first, I couldn’t see it. Then when I spotted it it seemed plain and unappealing, which is probably why I missed spotting it at first.

ThAt0n36Uy, as exe said - it’s the final product that counts not the time/methods that went into making it. Just relax when someone doesn’t like your criticism. I’m sure if you disagreed with what someone said about your work you’d react similarly
[/quote]

I really don’t need you speaking to me condescendingly when that argument occurred over a month ago.[/quote]

I didn’t speak condescendingly, before you try to use big words make sure you understand what they mean. However I apoligise for not seeing the date on the thread, my mistake. You can blame Mr Phat for that one as I was tracing his spammy posts xD

item.source: Halo Sig - first sig in a while

item.title: Halo Sig - first sig in a while
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:4, topic:162226”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=220642.msg1910820#msg1910820 date=1196646880]

…
[/quote]

A couple things wrong with this. For one thing it looks like you just took a couple brushes and brushed the background. Then took a render placed it on top of the brushed layers, and added a Fill Layer. Second thing wrong is the Linear Dodge on the Rocket Launcher, it doesn’t accurately represent the texture of the Rocket Launcher. It contrasts with the left side of the signatures where the brushing is way too much. It makes the brushes look like they were just strewn about and weren’t carefully placed. You should have taken a stock photo of maybe a burning building instead of the brushes and place it on the left, brushed over it a bit and been done, it would have looked quite a lot better.

Another thing, the text like RXVL quoted. It should blend with the rest of the image, not detract from it. You screwed up the reflection on it as well. It looks like you just set it to overlay. I’d leave it as overlay, move it 13 pixels down. And redo the reflection, place it closer to the bottom of the text and erase the y’s loop at the bottom. After that make it into a smart object and make it into a gradient.

4/10[/quote]

well i didnt make it doing anything you just said lol

Read full topic
item.source: Halo Sig - first sig in a while

item.title: Halo Sig - first sig in a while
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I don’t like how people judge on how much work was on it, you should be judging on appearance. I mean really, what else is art other than a nice picture? You don’t need to know every step put into it to know it looks good.

op:
The text is throwing me off and there’s a bit too-much yellow; try adding a variety of other colors stretching from orange to red and possibly to violet if you need, sticking to one color isn’t always the best thing.

Read full topic
item.source: Halo Sig - first sig in a while

item.title: Halo Sig - first sig in a while
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:1, topic:162226”]
…[/quote]

A couple things wrong with this. For one thing it looks like you just took a couple brushes and brushed the background. Then took a render placed it on top of the brushed layers, and added a Fill Layer. Second thing wrong is the Linear Dodge on the Rocket Launcher, it doesn’t accurately represent the texture of the Rocket Launcher. It contrasts with the left side of the signatures where the brushing is way too much. It makes the brushes look like they were just strewn about and weren’t carefully placed. You should have taken a stock photo of maybe a burning building instead of the brushes and place it on the left, brushed over it a bit and been done, it would have looked quite a lot better.

Another thing, the text like RXVL quoted. It should blend with the rest of the image, not detract from it. You screwed up the reflection on it as well. It looks like you just set it to overlay. I’d leave it as overlay, move it 13 pixels down. And redo the reflection, place it closer to the bottom of the text and erase the y’s loop at the bottom. After that make it into a smart object and make it into a gradient.

4/10

Read full topic
item.source: Halo Sig - first sig in a while

item.title: Halo Sig - first sig in a while
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

7.5/10

Text is to small and plain for my tastes, but the gfxs are nice.

My First Sig

As for the text… again, try to make it look like it belongs there. Don’t downplay it’s importance. Text is something that makes or breaks an image. Choose an appropriate font; trial and error will get you there. The text should really mesh with the rest of the image.

Read full topic
